intents.sub_intent: how to save money on insurance premiums
intents.user_motivation: Users want actionable advice to reduce costs and maximize savings.
intents.search_context: Users search this when they feel their insurance costs are too high or are exploring ways to optimize their expenses.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Leverage ING's digital tools to provide personalized insurance savings calculators.
intents.content_format_recommendation: Listicle with actionable tips and embedded calculators.

intents.sub_intent: how to choose the right insurance plan
intents.user_motivation: Users want guidance to select the most suitable insurance plan based on their needs.
intents.search_context: Users search this when comparing insurance options or entering a new life stage (e.g., buying a home, starting a family).
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Highlight ING's expertise in financial planning and insurance advisory.
intents.content_format_recommendation: Interactive guide with decision trees and case studies.

intents.sub_intent: how to file an insurance claim effectively
intents.user_motivation: Users want to ensure their claims are processed quickly and successfully.
intents.search_context: Users search this after experiencing an incident requiring insurance coverage.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Provide step-by-step claim filing tutorials integrated with ING's digital banking app.
intents.content_format_recommendation: Step-by-step guide with visuals and downloadable templates.

intents.sub_intent: how to avoid common mistakes with insurance adjusters
intents.user_motivation: Users want to avoid errors that could negatively impact their claim outcomes.
intents.search_context: Users search this when preparing to interact with insurance adjusters post-incident.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Offer expert advice and legal insights through ING's trusted brand.
intents.content_format_recommendation: Checklist with do's and don'ts for adjuster interactions.

intents.sub_intent: how to maximize benefits from insurance policies
intents.user_motivation: Users want to ensure they are fully utilizing the benefits of their insurance plans.
intents.search_context: Users search this when reviewing their insurance coverage or planning to renew policies.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Showcase ING's expertise in optimizing financial products for customer benefit.
intents.content_format_recommendation: Educational article with examples and tips.

sub_intents: how to save money on insurance premiums
how to avoid paying high auto insurance
intent_clusters.ing_competitive_advantage: ING can leverage its digital banking tools to provide personalized cost-saving insights.
intent_clusters.content_strategy: Create a series of cost-saving guides and calculators tailored to different insurance types.

sub_intents: how to choose the right insurance plan
how to maximize benefits from insurance policies
intent_clusters.ing_competitive_advantage: ING's European expertise and customer trust can position it as a reliable advisor for insurance planning.
intent_clusters.content_strategy: Develop interactive tools and guides to help users compare and select insurance plans.

sub_intents: how to file an insurance claim effectively
how to avoid common mistakes with insurance adjusters
intent_clusters.ing_competitive_advantage: ING can integrate claims management advice into its digital banking app for seamless user experience.
intent_clusters.content_strategy: Publish step-by-step guides and checklists for claims management.

highest_probability_streams: how to save money on insurance premiums
how to choose the right insurance plan
how to maximize benefits from insurance policies
quick_wins: how to avoid common mistakes with insurance adjusters
how to file an insurance claim effectively
